ja490:8.1: uragā dujivha → uraga dvijivha (bj) | uraga dujivha (s2, s3) | uragaddujivha (pts1)
ja490:10.2: Kanditvā roditvā → kanditvā roditva (bj) | kanditva roditva (pts1)
ja490:16.2: Atricchatā → atricchatāya (bj, s2, s3, pts1), mallagāmaṃ → malataṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | mallayataṃ (mr)
ja490:20.1: Evampahaṃ vandi na → evampahaṃ naggahe (bj, pts1) | evampihaṃ vandi na (s2, s3)
